name: Last Moment (Finn Pickart)
description:
It's the last day on earth and the sun is going to explode in 1 minute.

But by being happy, time passes slower.

So you are happy AND have more time. A win win situation.

You delay the inevitable by being happy.

Video Controls
  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Space / W / UP
  • Fullscreen - F11
